name: Missing Me
description:
What happened to the sun?!

You are a depressed farmer whose emotional state is tied to the sun’s existence. It is currently absent, and your dying plants speak to you, asking that you go into town and interact with its people for the betterment of your mental health. As you do so, the sun returns to the sky and the plants return to their original splendor.

This narrative RPG is a student project from UCSC's 120 series classes. It was made in Spring 2022 and utilizes the Phaser 3 library.

 JAKE INDGIN - NARRATIVE, ART  TAI WEN LEE - PROGRAMMING  LILY PHAM - ART  RACHEL TRIEU - SOUND, ART, PROGRAMMING
